name: Salmon Teriyaki
description: Put the ginger and garlic into a bowl and mix with the soy sauce, maple syrup, mirin and a drizzle of olive oil

name: Grilled Mushroom
description: Combine butter, dill and garlic salt, brush over mushrooms.

name: Chicken Overload Meal
description: A massive meal box with a lot of variety . Chicken tandoori gravy, Kebabs, Dal Makhani,Paratha , Salad and Gulabjamun

name: Chinese Egg Fry
description: Stir-fried tomato and scrambled eggs is a common dish in China

name: Chicken Wraps
description: A wrap is made with a soft flatbread rolled around a filling.

name: Veggie Delight
description: Add mushrooms and tofu; stir-fry 2 minutes. Add carrot, corn, and water chestnuts, stir-fry 1 minute. Stir in soy sauce and vinegar; cook 2 minutes. Stir in green onions, sesame oil, pepper, and salt.

name: Seafood Combo
description: Sprinkle a dash of salt and pepper; continue cooking for another 2–3 minutes or until the shrimp turns pink and the vegetables are tender but still crunchy.

name: Full Tandoori
description: Tandoori chicken is chicken dish prepared by roasting chicken marinated in yoghurt and spices in a tandoor, a cylindrical clay oven
